channel.title: Wisp doesn't show when converted?
channel.description:
#### What happened? N1- Princess wisps king, see's paladin visit, but it was actually paladin AND Cult Leader
#### What was SUPPOSED to happen? Last I knew king should have seen 2 visitors
#### Steps to reproduce: Wisp and convert someone
#### Comments: Some people say wisps have never shown converts, but since I've lost like 3 games to it, I know that isn't the case. If something got changed it REALLY needs to say so in the Wisp Description that "Converts will not be shown" or something similar.
We lost because we killed the Observer who saw the Cult Leader visit because _obviously_ he was a Scorned since there was no visit that night per the wisp.
